hr.fer.zemris.java.hw12.jvdraw

Interface DrawingModel

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Drawing

    public interface DrawingModel
    Represents model for vector drawings.
    Author:
    ilijan

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getSize

        int getSize()
        Getter for the size of the drawing, i.e. number of GeometricObject objects in the drawing.
        Returns:
        size of the drawing.

      • getObject

        GeometricObject getObject(int index)
        Getter for the object at specified index.
        Parameters:
        index - index of the wanted object.
        Returns:
        object at the specified index.

      • indexOf

        int indexOf(GeometricObject object)
        Getter for the index of the specified object.
        Parameters:
        object - object for which index is asked.
        Returns:
        index of the given object.

      • raiseObject

        void raiseObject(int index)
        Raises object's z-index by one.
        Parameters:
        index - index of the object to be raised.

      • lowerObject

        void lowerObject(int index)
        Lowers object's z-index by one.
        Parameters:
        index - index of the object to be lowered.

      • draw

        void draw(Graphics2D g)
        Draws drawing using supplied Graphics2D object.
        Parameters:
        g - object used for rendering graphics.

      • add

        void add(GeometricObject object)
        Adds GeometricObject to the drawing.
        Parameters:
        object - object to be added.

      • remove

        void remove(GeometricObject object)
        Removes GeometricObject to the drawing.
        Parameters:
        object - object to be removed.

      • isModified

        boolean isModified()
        Checks if drawing was modified.
        Returns:
        true if drawing was modified, false otherwise.

      • addDrawingModelListener

        Adds DrawingModelListener to the collection of listeners.
        Parameters:
        l - listener to be added.

        l - listener to be removed.
